title: Audit Log
description: This schema defines type for Audit Log. Audit Log is used to capture audit trail of POST, PUT, and PATCH API operations.

method.description: HTTP Method used in a call.

responseCode.description: HTTP response code for the api requested.

userName.description: Name of the user who requested for the API.

dateTime.description: Date which the api call is made.

entityId.description: Entity Id that was modified by the operation.

entityType.description: Entity Type that modified by the operation.
